reviewText: I've been wanting to learn the Hustle and was searching for a video to learn the dance.  I found this video easy to learn from and they explained the different moves and how to lead each move.  I ordered the intermediate/advance video within a week.  you will be able to learn the Hustle easily with this video.  buy you will like it.

This is a very nice dance instructional video. I'm a
Salsa fanatic, thus I'm able to pick up the timing
and the concepts in this video. My only comment or
suggestion is that this video should have spent
more time explaining the basic footwork by itself
as most salsa videos do (some people may find it
hard to jump almost right into a close position
push & pull.) They could also rehearse a little about
how they address the audience.
Other than that, this is a video I highly recommend.
